elementSpec.desc: A quotation from some other document, together with a bibliographic reference to its source. In a dictionary it may contain an example text with at least one occurrence of the word form, used in the sense being described, or a translation of the headword or an example.
[To be revised] Una cita de algún otro documento junto a la referencia bibliográfica a la fuente.
[To be revised] 從其他文件中引用的內容，並包含引用來源的書目參照資料。
[To be revised] 多文書からの引用．元資料への書誌参照情報も含む．

attDef.desc: further indicates the contextual role of the quotation. Possible values may be 'translation', 'example', etc.

cit.quote: and the breath of the whale is frequently attended with such an insupportable smell, as to bring on disorder of the brain.
elle était horrifiée par la dépense
she was horrified at the expense.

remarks.p: Must contain a single quote and a single bibliographic reference in either order
